Docs.summary: The defines an endpoint for managing installation registrations for a Notification Hub associated with this service.

Docs.param: The installation id to register or modify.
Docs.summary: Enables the registration of a device installation for push notifications via PUT request. If the specified installationId does not exist on the notification hub, a new installation is created and registered. If the specified installationId already exists, the installation is modified.
Docs.returns: describing the result of the operation.
